vote.title: Appointment of Hugh Black Jr., 1275 E. 15th Avenue, Columbus, OH 43211, to serve on the South Linden Area Commission, replacing Lawrence Calloway, with a new term start date of March 1, 2021 and an expiration date of December 31, 2023 (resume attached).

Appointment of Hugh Black Jr., 1275 E. 15th Avenue, Columbus, OH 43211, to serve on the South Linden Area Commission, replacing Lawrence Calloway, with a new term start date of March 1, 2021 and an expiration date of December 31, 2023 (resume attached).
